com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.emailserver
Interface MailServer

All Superinterfaces:
com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Server
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMailServer, DumbsterMailServer, GreenmailMailServer, SubEthaSMTPMailServer
public interface MailServer
extends com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Server

The interface declaring the methods that must be defined in the mail server implementations.

Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Brian Matthews

          Sets the offset that will be applied to the standard port numbers for the mail protocols.

          Indicates whether the mail protocols should be secured using SSL/TLS.

Method Detail

setPortOffset

void setPortOffset(int offset)
Sets the offset that will be applied to the standard port numbers for the mail protocols.

Parameters:
offset - The port offset.

setUseSSL

void setUseSSL(boolean useSSL)
Indicates whether the mail protocols should be secured using SSL/TLS.

Parameters:
useSSL -
  • true - SSL/TLS will be used.
  • false - SSL/TLS will not be used.
